has research problem.from sentence: Structural Scaffolds for Citation Intent Classification in Scientific Publications

has research problem: Identifying the intent of a citation in scientific papers

has research problem.from sentence: Identifying the intent of a citation in scientific papers ( e.g. , background information , use of methods , comparing results ) is critical for machine reading of individual publications and automated analysis of the scientific literature .
In this work , we approach the problem of citation intent classification by modeling the language expressed in the citation context .
